title: Radisson Blu Guwahati to add 85 new rooms and 10,000 square feet area
description: Radisson Blu Guwahati is expanding with 85 new rooms and an additional 10,000 square feet area. The hotel has also launched 'Meetha by Radisson Hotels,' a dessert destination, and plans to introduce it in Kolkata next year. This initiative aims to celebrate Indian sweets and culture.
